title: 400: CHATTY BROS: Grayston’s Ex Interview
itunes:title: 400: CHATTY BROS: Grayston’s Ex Interview
description:
The time has come! It’s Grayston’s turn to interview his ex girlfriend, Liv! First The Bros discuss Evan’s emergency injury and upcoming surgery - and then they dive into a chat with the Ex (00:24:00)! They discuss the long history of their relationship, why they broke up, Grayston’s best and worst qualities, Liv finding out Bekah was pregnant, and much more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
